issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implements REGEXP_EXTRACT function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13052](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13052). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implements the REGEXP_EXTRACT function based on the [the Hive implementation](https://www.revisitclass.com/hadoop/regexp_extract-function-in-hive-with-examples/)
